Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting
Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.

I posted my notes into the Bi-Weekly Meeting Notes; they might be a little _too_ verbose, lol:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZtxZNWbTNIhDdIXt27NQdwuc6D5O288l5HZKc_wC0FQ/edit#

Wasmtime Bi-Weekly Meeting Notes
2020-11-26 AGENDA ToDo Review: Alex, Draft of a meta-RFC; RFC-RFC Alex, Final pass on PR Andrew, merge wasi-nn Till, Release Process Thoughts and notes from fastly Liam, Questions & Decisions to ask Andrew, blog post Future Topics Backlog: Release Criteria for 1.0 Release Processes ADL: Architec...
Please give me some feedback here; I also added a little structure to carry over our todo's and topic backlog over
I would also comment that the next regularly scheduled meeting is on a Thanksgiving Day in the US; not sure if we would consider moving the meeting forward / backward a day @Till Schneidereit
Thank you so much for sharing these, @Liam Randall! I think it's great to have detailed notes of this kind, and I really appreciate you putting in this work
And yes, good call on Thanksgiving! I'll make sure to move the meeting, or explicitly cancel it if we can't find a good alternative time

It was my pleasure. I am happy to help. Please let me know if that's _too_ detailed or if you'd like it captured but w/o attribution.

On the scheduling, I feel like there is so much positive work going on and it's only twice a month - heading into the holidays does it make sense to just do this one on Wednesday?

On the release processes, I'm running down a checklist of key decisions for you to make; hopefully it will organize it a bit for you.

It was my pleasure. I am happy to help. Please let me know if that's _too_ detailed or if you'd like it captured but w/o attribution.

I think it's good, though we should start the meeting with an explicit mention of public notes to make sure people are aware

On the scheduling, I feel like there is so much positive work going on and it's only twice a month - heading into the holidays does it make sense to just do this one on Wednesday?

good point, yes. I'll look into the scheduling and see if Wednesday works for enough people

On the release processes, I'm running down a checklist of key decisions for you to make; hopefully it will organize it a bit for you.

Thank you, that sounds great!
